biotools.summary: fastSCOP identifies structural domains and determines evolutionary superfamilies of a query protein structure using 3D-BLAST to scan SCOP and MAMMOTH to create a structural alignment for refining domain boundaries.

bioschemas.name: fastSCOP
bioschemas.summary: fastSCOP identifies structural domains and determines evolutionary superfamilies of a query protein structure using 3D-BLAST to scan SCOP and MAMMOTH to create a structural alignment for refining domain boundaries.
